title: Conceptual Questions
text:
If your working directory is myfolder/homework/, what relative path would you specify to get the file located at myfolder/MyData.csv?

../MyData.csv

What are the major benefits of using R projects?

By using R Projects, the separation of associated documents, data sources, and other files for each project is maintained. Each project also serves as a working directory, so sharing and collaborating with others is easier.

What is git and what is github?

Git is a version control software and Github is a tool where Git is hosted.

What are the two main differences between a tibble and a data.frame?

Tibbles print in a more efficient and interpret-able way than data frames. They show the first couple of rows and columns and a count of the number of total observations and columns. Tibbles are also more strict and require consistent data types than data frames.

Rewrite the following nested function call using BaseRâ€™s chaining operator:
arrange(filter(select(as_tibble(iris), starts_with("Petal"), Species), Petal.Length <1.55), Species)

iris |>
as_tibble() |>
select(starts_with("Petal"), Species) |>
filter(Petal.Length <1.55) |>
arrange(Species)
